node.title: The Many Variations of Mexican Chicken Soup
node.description: Pati Jinich will discuss the comforts of regional chicken soup at a virtual class at the 92nd Street Y.
node.content: ["For soup season, expanding the inventory of warm, steaming bowls of richness is ever so welcome. An hourlong virtual class that explores the regional variations for chicken soup in Mexico will be led later this month by the cookbook author and television chef Pati Jinich, who has written for The Times, for the 92nd Street Y\u2019s program. Those that enroll can access the class later.", "Follow NYT Food on Twitter and NYT Cooking on Instagram, Facebook and Pinterest. Get regular updates from NYT Cooking, with recipe suggestions, cooking tips and shopping advice."]
